text: Nau vavade Levite, hāedadauau hadaunith, haeeda sa10.32 Two words across a page (“haeeda” and “sa”) perhaps should have been hyphenated, giving “haeedasa” which, together with “haeedasaa”, occurs eleven times elsewhere in the text. There are no other occurrences of “sa” standing alone. nau haenāauhauva, nau haejavechautha gauchuhunee.
